attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I and the undersigned feel that it is the parents duty to punish their children, it is not fair that punishment such as smacking is illegal, it doesnt have serious lasting affects and alot of my friends who are good were smacked and the one who are constantly picking fights and causing trouble weren't,the undersigned think that smacking is a effective form of punishment and doesn't have serious lasting affects, we also feel its unfair that they limit parents choices of punishment

rejection.details: Please provide both your first and last names when submitting a petition.
reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
